title: Tumbleweed Chromoly Pannier and T-Rack Available in Silver
content:
Tumbleweed‘s popular Chromoly Pannier and T-Racks are now available in silver (clear coated anodizing) finish, including silver hardware and struts. Both racks are in stock and shipping today from Tumbleweed. As for the touring bike they’re currently shown on, that’s the award-winning Tumbleweed Sunliner. If you’d like to see it with front/rear racks and bags, check out John’s review from last year.

The post Tumbleweed Chromoly Pannier and T-Rack Available in Silver appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
